TopicTitle: Kerbin Baja Racing for KerbTown and KSPv0.21.1+

Articles.Content:
ARE you FAST? Prove it!

This requires you have KerbTown installed, - Thanks to Raz for making it, this wouldn't be possible without some hard work he's put in.

What you get:

1) the Kerbin Baja dirt track! 2) a neato plugin that keeps track of a) lap times total race time c) top speed attained during the race. 3) a way to prove you're fast!

What to do:

1) Head over to the track - beside the KSC. 2) Stop on the start/finish line (under the Baja banner!) 3) When ready press the 'Shift' or 'right Apple' on your keyboard. 4) Follow the track, each time you pass a checkpoint the light will change colour and a message will display. 5) Every lap you'll get a lap time 6) The race lasts 3 laps, you will get a total race time. (take a screenshot at the end of the race, this proves to people how fast you are!)

Other info: Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ press the 'end' key to reset the race. *** This does not reset or fix your car in any way***

Tips: Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Keep a tow/bump vehicle at the track for emergency use. Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Design your cars with a low center of gravity.

This is the first track, I will likely follow up later with a larger track, once I get a feel for if people like this or not. Please post comments, pics and videos!!! this helps.

Thanks to: Razchek & Snjo

LINK: (since I can't get it onto spaceport) https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B82_uLLhCvSPQmZ6a3QxeUlPc28/edit?pli=1 - Let me know if there are any issues with the link. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 Unported License

Code: http://pastebin.com/WDEjUTJM

Edited September 16, 2013 by InfiniteDice
I'll set the bar! Enjoy everyone!
Kerbal Kart i m in xD need some funny driver avatar now huhu.
Here is the original silly video I made... The track has been updated and has more features now. This is also before I added any special functionality.
Getting my vehicle stuck/wheels exploded on certain parts of the track made me rage, but it's fun. This also gave me a reason to retune some custom wheels.

After several crashes and difficulties with the jumps,

Bill managed the track and raised the bar a little bit

I love this mod, great work.
Nice! And so begins the hunt for the best car!

Updated my wheel mod after seeing how much trouble the last version had with this. I've also included a craft file - I'm sure it won't be one of the fastest but it's very tough -and these wheels will provide a different experience if you are used to stock wheels.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/gear-prototype-pack/
Looks like fun. Wonder how it handles low terrain quality? I've had other Kerbtown-based mods not liking low terrain quality. (*cough* missile silo *cough*)

For people who could be interested, I have recompile the plug-in for 0.23.5 + fix a little issue, and move the track a bit to make it easier to get on.

Can add a link here later (message sent a while back to InfiniteDice, still no answer yet, so I took it for a grant for just this tiny update).

Edited March 20, 2015 by Master Tao
